Performance
================================================================================

Row
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### National

```{r}
output$performance <- renderPlotly({
  x <- aggregate(cbind(Cured, Death, Default, `Non-Responder`) ~ Month + Year, 
                 data = monitoring, FUN = sum) %>% 
    calculate_performance() %>%
    mutate(Month = factor(x = Month, 
                          levels = c("Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", 
                                     "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec")))
  
  z <- x %>% 
    ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Month, group = Year)) +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(y = cured_prop * 100), colour = "darkgreen") +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(y = dead_prop * 100), colour = "black") +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(y = defaulter_prop * 100), colour = "red") +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(y = nr_prop * 100), colour = "gray70") +
    scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 100),
                       breaks = seq(from = 0, to = 100, by = 10)) +
    labs(y = "%") +
    facet_wrap( ~ Year, ncol = 4) +
    theme_bw()  
  
  ggplotly(p = z)
})

plotlyOutput("performance")
```

Row
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### By state

```{r, fig.height = 12}
xstate <- reactive({
  aggregate(cbind(Cured, Death, Default, `Non-Responder`) ~ State + Month + Year, 
               data = monitoring, FUN = sum) %>% 
    calculate_performance() %>%
    filter(Year == input$chosen_year) %>%
    mutate(Month = factor(x = Month, levels = c("Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", 
                                                "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", 
                                                "Nov", "Dec")))
})

output$state_performance <- renderPlotly({
  z <- xstate() %>%
    ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Month, group = State)) +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(y = cured_prop * 100), colour = "darkgreen") +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(y = dead_prop * 100), colour = "black") +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(y = defaulter_prop * 100), colour = "red") +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(y = nr_prop * 100), colour = "gray70") +
    scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 100),
                       breaks = seq(from = 0, to = 100, by = 10)) +
    labs(y = "%") +
    facet_wrap( ~ State, ncol = 6) +
    theme_bw()  
  
  ggplotly(p = z)
})

plotlyOutput("state_performance")
```

### By locality

```{r, fig.height = 12}
xlocality <- reactive({
  monitoring %>% 
    calculate_performance() %>%
    filter(Year == input$chosen_year,
           State == input$state_name) %>%
    mutate(Month = factor(x = Month, levels = c("Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", 
                                                "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", 
                                                "Nov", "Dec")))
})

output$locality_performance <- renderPlotly({
  z <- xlocality() %>%
    ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Month, group = Locality)) +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(y = cured_prop * 100), colour = "darkgreen") +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(y = dead_prop * 100), colour = "black") +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(y = defaulter_prop * 100), colour = "red") +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(y = nr_prop * 100), colour = "gray70") +
    scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 100),
                       breaks = seq(from = 0, to = 100, by = 10)) +
    labs(y = "%") +
    facet_wrap( ~ Locality, ncol = 6) +
    theme_bw()  
  
  ggplotly(p = z)
})

plotlyOutput("locality_performance")
```
